Translations.Text: Ekabyakti ca'ila, se'i ayaba sanghatita hoka ya abadharita
kapheradera jan'ye, yara pratirodhakari ke'u ne'i.
Ta asabe allaha taâ€™alara paksa theke, yini samunnata martabara adhikari.
Pheresatagana ebam ruha allaha taâ€™alara dike urdhbagami haya emana ekadine, yara parimana pancasa hajara bachara.
Ata'eba, apani uttama sabara karuna.
Tara e'i ayabake suduraparahata mane kare
ara ami eke asanna dekhachi.
Sedina akasa habe galita tamara mata.
Ebam parbatasamuha habe rangina pasamera mata
bandhu bandhura khabara nibe na.
Yadi'o eke aparake dekhate pabe. Sedina gonahagara byakti panasbarupa dite ca'ibe tara santana-santatike
tara strike, tara bhratake
tara gosthike, yara take asraya dita.
Ebam prthibira sabakichuke, atahpara nijeke raksa karate ca'ibe.
Kakhana'i naya. Niscaya eta lelihana agni.
Ya camara tule dibe.
Se se'i byaktike dakabe ye satyera prati prsthapradarsana karechila o bimukha hayechila.
Sampada punjibhuta karechila, atahpara agaliye rekhechila.
Manusa to srjita hayeche bhirurupe.
Yakhana take anista sparsa kare, takhana se ha-hutasa kare.
Ara yakhana kalyanaprapta haya, takhana krpana haye yaya.
Tabe tara sbatantra, yara namaya adaya kari.
Yara tadera namaye sarbaksanika kayema thake.
Ebam yadera dhana-sampade nirdharita haka ache
yanchakari o bancitera
ebam yara pratiphala dibasake satya bale bisbasa kare.
Ebam yara tadera palanakartara sastira samparke bhita-kampita.
Niscaya tadera palanakartara sasti theke nihsanka thaka yaya na.
Ebam yara tadera yauna-angake sanyata rakhe
kintu tadera stri athaba malikanabhukta dasidera belaya tiraskrta habe na.
Ata'eba, yara edera chara an'yake kamana kare, tara'i simalanghanakari.
Ebam yara tadera amanata o angikara raksa kare
ebam yara tadera saksyadane sarala-nisthabana
ebam yara tadera namaye yatnabana
tara'i jannate sam'manita habe.
